title: The Avengers: Slate's Spoiler Special
description:
Slate's Dana Stevens and SlateV's Chris Wade discuss The Avengers. WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
